issue.title: [CF 750] Text Displays Frame Strata
issue.body:
Currently, the frame strata on Text Displays is such that if the timer sweep is enabled (Show Timer), the timer sweep appears over the text on the icon in question. This is the functionality as of r697.

Example of the issue:

The bottom icon is using Text Displays in conjunction with Show Timer.

The suggestion is to change this such that Text Displays appears on top of Show Timer's sweep.

Original comment: http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/tellmewhen?comment=3223


> Posted by CurseForge user TheCheat5 | Imported from CurseForge issue #750 | Raw

comments.body:
Fixed in r706


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
